    controls the flow when the user sends a contact-add request

    controls the flow when the user is engaging in a chat session
    ConnectionController
    Handles connection, connection loss, reconnection, and disconnection.
    ConnectionEventEnum
    Represents all possible connection event types

    This handles the flow when the user creates a new account
    LoginController
    This handles the flow when the user is logging in

    Controlls the flow for muc events.
